WaveNight.Night_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="314d6d9b98ab4041a32d61ac9de65e36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]要小心原生生物哦，呵呵呵。
WaveNight.Night_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3eddca82a614b5db7471e724a71080e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]首先增加发光皮克敏吧。
WaveNight.Night_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="36c3635912e54ed4a53a737051b5c576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]要守住发光巢穴。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1c72050f0b2f48159a34926701fdba5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]发光皮克敏越多，就越容易守住。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1ea9bcb13de7426ab841038ee72330e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]发狂的原生生物正前往发光巢穴哦。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c080130754ad4307a6cd9499777ff4d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]对付原生生物，[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]闪光爆裂[System:Color name="Default"]很有效。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="adda7d97d11b4cd08f29513fbbc88186" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]把诱饵巢穴当成[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]诱饵[System:Color name="Default"]使用吧，呵呵呵。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d9087fd455cd408699a398a8da00d89b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]用迷你雷达确认[System:Color name="Default"]发光巢穴的位置吧。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="eb49fe3b1be24cb9986d6ef50661005c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]发狂的原生生物在雷达上会显示[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]红色[System:Color name="Default"]。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_06: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="26e4e00b015c4175bee4876f402bd901" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]尽情地使用包包里的[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]道具[System:Color name="Default"]吧。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="64aa79119f0945e492c99da95574b1ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]让[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]也来保护发光巢穴吧。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_08: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6c7ce8ffe6194868bf744f45899a7ad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]使用[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]发光种子[System:Color name="Default"]增加发光皮克敏吧。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_09: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="25f223e511e5475bb0a9dc7ed1970b75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]请通过切换来分担任务。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_10: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="70338dde45e545e3b2e16baf384f1415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]使用请求可以让搭档[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]前往发光巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_11: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="51e2f00fe7cb4c2d9ebc46a018a7442d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]两个发光巢穴就分开守护吧。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_12: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="2079dc98dabb4f0da05285e72c899bf3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]在原生生物发狂前打倒它们也是可以的哦。
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4b268fd0633341adacf2c88de879df36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]就算发光皮克敏牺牲了也不必介怀。
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]它们会变成光粒子，回到发光巢穴。
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPLow_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0e5684c9edd04326ac5dc1f5b98c7c3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]黑夜终会过去⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]一定要想办法坚持住。
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5416b0302fbc49cd925d89ce42ef0e0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]还有很多事要做哦！
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c4e6b9ef56004505a3e08ab0a673907d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]真希望早上能快点到来啊，呵呵。
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="53ac734631bf42bd83adb8f5a02fcd66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]请看好发光巢穴！
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ef34a0d9838f48ce830777f5c24b4905" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]可以利用[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]迷你雷达[System:Color name="Default"]确认原生生物的行动。
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c882faab539b4a13bf565cf0f52dcb93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]确定发光皮克敏够了吗？
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a8612a770fa8474aacb3eec0c8a70958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]必须得想办法保护发光巢穴。
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b580a64b7a7a44aaa9ae3a3c178aee83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]和[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]合作，好好守护吧。
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d259e4c2d0b34dd0b54c088bf665e626" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]等数量够了以后就尽力守护吧。
WaveNight.Night_InvasionGensei_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4490532de2c64a14935d6d1a2c4183bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]原生生物们开始躁动起来了。
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]保护好发光巢穴吧，呵呵呵。
WaveNight.Night_InvasionGensei_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1ed55af054494073a59f5e368764a745" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]原生生物开始发狂了！
[Npc:Motion name="Command"/]为了让发光巢穴不受毁坏，转入防守吧！

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4eecba2dd5e14c5f8545412ac32b1142" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Carrot:HitHikaridukaName/]正遭受攻击！

WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="499dd4f2b06843da8ef71c3c4941d4b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]诱饵巢穴正遭受袭击。
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6e00addd510d4d2d8fd20bd847dcf603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]诱饵巢穴正遭受攻击⋯⋯
WaveNight.Night_Hozuki_Under_Attack_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0050ecc827754c3880da163e036c65f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]啊，诱饵巢穴被原生生物⋯⋯

WaveNight.Night_HurryUp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="cf2b15a1e97d4f93b89f53aae0d48ee0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]再过一会就天亮了。

WaveNight.Night_HurryUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5b872f5a0a774870b61041be6c90e485" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]离黎明不远了！

[Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]，[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]就拜托你了。
WaveNight.Night_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8f2af67a4d8c43568b8325eb5a9cdcc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]！你没事吧！？

WaveNight.Night_FirstDeadHikariPikmin: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="219be60e51274f5786583d15ef753fc5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]发光皮克敏牺牲了⋯⋯
WaveNight.Night_HikariPikmin_AttributeDamage: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6f6dd9d0962b4df3ab779c78577eba74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]咦，发光皮克敏安然无恙⋯⋯
WaveNight.Night_EncountChappy:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3ca31d8ac8845eb9374d7c1768846ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]好大的原生生物啊。
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]按[PictureFont:IconData key="FlashBang" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]使出[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]闪光爆裂[System:Color name="Default"]吧。
WaveNight.Night_Underwater_HikariStation: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="b93ece3af4d94ca4ae1e2da7696c0113" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]水里也有发光沛蕾特呢，呵呵呵。
WaveNight.Night_EncountTateanaBaby: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1513fe331f974f388a8d10e17186166f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]要是不摧毁源头，便会没完没了⋯⋯
